title: Math 3 Vol 1
text: HMH into Math 3

title: Unit 1: Understand Multiplication and Area
text: Modules in this Unit

title: Unit 1: Understand Multiplication and Area
text:
📘 Module 1: Understanding Multiplication


Explore the concept of multiplication through visual models and problem-solving strategies.

Start Module 1



📗 Module 2: Relate Multiplication and Area


Connect multiplication with area measurement using real-world examples and shapes.

Start Module 2

title: Unit 2: Multiplication and Division
text: Modules in this Unit

title: Unit 2: Multiplication and Division
text:
🧠 Module 3: Understand Multiplication Strategies


Learn efficient strategies like repeated addition, skip counting, and array models.

Start Module 3



🧩 Module 4: Apply Multiplication Properties as Strategies


Use the properties of multiplication—commutative, associative, and distributive—to solve problems more easily.

Start Module 4



🔢 Module 5: Multiplication with Multiples of 10


Practice multiplying numbers by 10, 100, and beyond using place value understanding.

Start Module 5



➗ Module 6: Understand Division


Explore the meaning of division through sharing, grouping, and real-world problems.

Start Module 6



🔄 Module 7: Relate Multiplication and Division


Make connections between multiplication and division using fact families and inverse operations.

Start Module 7



🛠️ Module 8: Apply Multiplication and Division


Apply your knowledge to solve multi-step problems combining multiplication and division.

Start Module 8

title: Unit 3: Addition and Subtraction Strategies and Applications
text: Modules in this Unit
crumbs: Unit 3: Addition and Subtraction Strategies and Applications

title: Unit 3: Addition and Subtraction Strategies and Applications
text:
➕ Module 9: Addition and Subtraction Strategies


Master strategies like counting on, making tens, and using number lines to solve addition and subtraction problems efficiently.

Start Module 9



🧮 Module 10: Addition and Subtraction Within 1,000


Build fluency in solving multi-digit addition and subtraction problems within 1,000 using place value understanding.

Start Module 10



📏 Module 11: Understand Perimeter


Explore how to measure and calculate the perimeter of various shapes using addition and multiplication strategies.

Start Module 11



⏰ Module 12: Time Measurement and Intervals


Learn to tell time to the nearest minute and solve word problems involving time intervals using a number line.

Start Module 12
crumbs: Unit 3: Addition and Subtraction Strategies and Applications
